body_html:
The cudnn.h header contains the version 6.0.21 as well, so no mismatch. As I said, I used to compile successfully, 2 months ago with the same setup.

But maybe another cudnn version got installed by conda, I will investigate this.
body_text:
The cudnn.h header contains the version 6.0.21 as well, so no mismatch. As I said, I used to compile successfully, 2 months ago with the same setup.
But maybe another cudnn version got installed by conda, I will investigate this.
body:
The `cudnn.h` header contains the version 6.0.21 as well, so no mismatch. As I said, I used to compile successfully, 2 months ago with the same setup.

But maybe another cudnn version got installed by conda, I will investigate this.
